short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If your computer administrator forces a startup page, this will prevent it!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This works great for school computers or home computers! Anytime you have an administrator modifying your default chrome settings you can use this extension!

It doesn't change any internal settings, it simply changes your starting Goolge Chrome tab (i.e. your startup page) to a new tab every time you open Google Chrome!
